page.title: 17AT THE WEEKEND
page.content: On Saturday I got up early and went out with my Dad to see if we could find any mushrooms. We didn't find many, but we heard a nightingale. At 8.30 I had breakfast of sausages, bacon and eggs and went outside to feed the chicks. Then I played on the computer until I had soup and cheese on toast for lunch. Then I went to Warnford to see my cousins. At about 3.30 when I got home I used my punch bag. I had salad for tea, then watched television and went to bed. I woke up at 7.30 on Sunday. I go boxing. We run around a field two times then we punch heavy bags. Then we skip. I went home and had Sunday roast for dinner. I hate it. I changed and rode to Warnford but there was no-one to play with so I went home, had tea, watched telly, then went to bed. TOMMY BOYES
